input: Send a batch request to retrieve lock request events and update a specific lock request note.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCustomerLockRequestEventSpecifications HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCustomerLockRequests/220 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"Note":"Updated due to customer feedback."}

--request-separator--
